name: Amazoness
author: drackmord
notes:
Yet Another Amazoness Deck.
Played around with some balance builds for 20-ish wins, but the lack of techs from balance is just not enough to keep up with this meta.
I also really wanted to put Sage into work but it's just dead in the mirror and in many other matchups, I had to take it out.
Like many others said, this deck is super fun, super consistent, and the mirrors and surprisingly funny too.
